channel.title: I cant sign into bvs
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "I cant sign into bvs" - security code problem.

item.title: Re: I cant sign into bvs
item.content:encoded:
All we can tell you is do is the standard stuff, i.e. clear out your cache, do a hard refresh (ctrl-f5 on most browsers), close your browser and reopen it, reboot your computer, etc.

Also the capcha only lasts a couple of minutes at most. However that is enough time for even people on dial-up to enter it (provided they don't get distracted).

item.title: Re: I cant sign into bvs
item.content:encoded: my knowledge shows that most of the capcha is easy to read. if it looks like a number or letter it's the letter. i usually do them in lowercase with no problem.

item.title: I cant sign into bvs
item.content:encoded: Everytime I tried to sign in, it always will show 'Enter the 4-Character Code properly. Please retry' even though I typed it correctly. I retried many times but i still cannot sign in.
